plot outline: Varun Sandesh is an NRI, who comes to India for business reasons. He meets his project manager Mahi who already has a boy friend. As time passes by, Krish makes Mahi realize that her boyfriend is not a perfect match for her and makes her break up with him. An upset Mahi decides to up her game, and gets a make over.
title: Nuvvala Nenila
plot: Varun Sandesh is an NRI, who comes to India for business reasons. He meets his project manager Mahi who already has a boy friend. As time passes by, Krish makes Mahi realize that her boyfriend is not a perfect match for her and makes her break up with him. An upset Mahi decides to up her game, and gets a make over.
